talk_1002: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you for eliminating the intruders.<sp:0:4:0>I was listening closely to the goings-on.<sp:5:0:0>
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Northwestern Abandoned Mine that
man headed for is likely the <clr:0000>Abandoned
Hebra Mine<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>But there are few chasms in Hebra by
which to reach it.<sp:0:4:0>The path stretching from Hyrule Ridge
that was previously used is no longer a
viable route.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Though I recall there being a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>
somewhere that <clr:0000>connects directly<clr:ffff> to the
abandoned mine.
